subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{unknown|zh}}. {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} proposes two possible etymologies:
* Borrowing from {{bor|zh|qfa-tak}}; compare {{cog|tai-pro|*rawᴬ||we}} > {{cog|th|เรา||we}}, {{cog|za|raeuz||we (inclusive)}}; {{cog|qfa-kms-pro|*hra¹||two}} > {{cog|kmc|yac||two}}, {{cog|swi|xgaz||two}}.
* Cognate with {{cog|bo|སྲང||balance; scale; weight; unit of weight}}.

Derivative: {{och-l|輛|chariot}} (literally “that which is paired”, i.e. “a set of wheels”).
